azurerm_backup_policy_vm.description: Manages an Azure Backup VM Backup Policy.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Backup Policy. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the policy. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

recovery_vault_name.description: Specifies the name of the Recovery Services Vault to use. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

backup.description: Configures the Policy backup frequency, times & days as documented in the `backup` block below.

retention_daily.description: Configures the policy daily retention as documented in the `retention_daily` block below. Required when backup frequency is `Daily`.

retention_weekly.description: Configures the policy weekly retention as documented in the `retention_weekly` block below. Required when backup frequency is `Weekly`.

retention_monthly.description: Configures the policy monthly retention as documented in the `retention_monthly` block below.

retention_yearly.description: Configures the policy yearly retention as documented in the `retention_yearly` block below.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

frequency.description: Sets the backup frequency. Must be either `Daily` or`Weekly`.

time.description: The time of day to perform the backup in 24hour format.

weekdays.description: The weekday backups to retain . Must be one of `Sunday`, `Monday`, `Tuesday`, `Wednesday`, `Thursday`, `Friday` or `Saturday`.

count.description: The number of yearly backups to keep. Must be between `1` and `9999`

weeks.description: The weeks of the month to retain backups of. Must be one of `First`, `Second`, `Third`, `Fourth`, `Last`.

months.description: The months of the year to retain backups of. Must be one of `January`, `February`, `March`, `April`, `May`, `June`, `July`, `Augest`, `September`, `October`, `November` and `December`.

id.description: The ID of the VM Backup Policy.

create.description: Used when creating the VM Backup Policy.

update.description: Used when updating the VM Backup Policy.

read.description: Used when retrieving the VM Backup Policy.

delete.description: Used when deleting the VM Backup Policy.
